title: Air Quality KDD 2018 - 75 Percent
description: This is a variation of the Air Quality KDD 2018dataset. In this variation, 75% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. HOURLY

forecastTarget.description: Air quality metric: PM2.5 - particles that are 2.5 microns or less in diameter (µg/m³)
